com.da.antiphish.corpus

Class CorpusCollector

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.da.antiphish.corpus.CorpusCollector

  • public class CorpusCollector
extends Object
    CorpusCollector collects a training corpus of 10.000 phishing and 10.000 legitimate sites and a test corpus of 4.000 phishing and 4.000 legitimate sites.
    Author:
    Marco Madritsch

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      CorpusCollector() 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static void getLegitimateSites()
      Reads a subset of 10.000 legitimate URLs randomly from GoodURLs list, downloads their content and stores them in JSON files under /training/legitimate.
      static void getPhishingSites()
      Reads a subset of 10.000 phishing URLs randomly from PhishTank blacklist, downloads their content and stores them in JSON files under /training/phishing.
      static void main(String[] args) 
      static List<String> readLegitimatesFromFile(String path)
      Reads all legitimate urls from the given path (= text file) and returns a list of them.
      static List<String> readPhishsFromFile(String path)
      Reads all phishing urls from the given path (= json blacklist from phish tank) and returns a list of them.
      static boolean saveUrlContent(org.jsoup.nodes.Document htmlDoc, String url, String path)
      Saves the HTML content of the given Jsoup Document as json file in the specified path.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • CorpusCollector

        public CorpusCollector()

    • Method Detail

      • main

        public static void main(String[] args)

      • getPhishingSites

        public static void getPhishingSites()
        Reads a subset of 10.000 phishing URLs randomly from PhishTank blacklist, downloads their content and stores them in JSON files under /training/phishing. Reads another subset of 4.000 phishing URLs also randomly from PhishTank blacklist, downloads their content and stores them in JSON files under /test/phishing. Both subsets are disjunct.

      • getLegitimateSites

        public static void getLegitimateSites()
        Reads a subset of 10.000 legitimate URLs randomly from GoodURLs list, downloads their content and stores them in JSON files under /training/legitimate. Reads another subset of 4.000 legitimate URLs also randomly from GoodURLs list, downloads their content and stores them in JSON files under /test/legitimate. Both subsets are disjunct.

      • saveUrlContent

        public static boolean saveUrlContent(org.jsoup.nodes.Document htmlDoc,
                                     String url,
                                     String path)
        Saves the HTML content of the given Jsoup Document as json file in the specified path.
        Parameters:
        htmlDoc - the HTML content as a Jsoup Document
        url - the URL of the website
        path - the path where it should be stored
        Returns:
        true, if success, false otherwise

      • readPhishsFromFile

        public static List<String> readPhishsFromFile(String path)
        Reads all phishing urls from the given path (= json blacklist from phish tank) and returns a list of them.
        Parameters:
        path - the path where it should be read
        Returns:
        a list of phishing urls

      • readLegitimatesFromFile

        public static List<String> readLegitimatesFromFile(String path)
        Reads all legitimate urls from the given path (= text file) and returns a list of them.
        Parameters:
        path - the path where it should be read
        Returns:
        a list of legitimate urls
